feedback: The presentation slides were very well designed and informative. Would be great to have them shared with all attendees afterward.
The speaker was excellent but the Q&A session was cut short. Please allocate more time for questions in future events.
Try to speak more slowly and enunciate more clearly. Some attendees in the back had trouble hearing you.
The coffee during the break was amazing!
Include more real-world examples in your next presentation to better illustrate the concepts.
The room was too cold, please adjust the temperature for tomorrow's sessions.
I really liked the speaker's tie.
Your slides had too much text. Consider using more visuals and less text for better audience engagement.
